fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Learn a player's role each night.
- Trigger a triggered effect on a player's role at any time it could trigger. This ability resolves immediately, but you may only use it once each day/night cycle. (A triggered effect is something that happens "when", "whenever", or "if" something else happens, such as most Everfrost attributes.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - When you trigger a triggered effect, you decide all additional information for it. For example, if you trigger the triggered effect in 632: Glacier's first attribute, you may choose the player who is roleblocked for an additional night afterwards.
